attributes.action: shamefull  BBC coverage of the royal  diamond jubilee
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC should be brought to account for their shamefull and inane television coverage of the Diamond jubilee.

despite general protest through the media and by the general public about the standard of presentation of these once in a lifetime events they seem arrogant and oblivious to admit any failings on there part.

I am forced to pay them a licence fee and expect in return a quality service ,which was lacking over the last few days.
